messages.subject: babysitters, family bed and t.v
messages.msgSnippet: Amy, We too don t use babysitters, in fact my children aged 7.5 and 3.5 have only been left about 3 times by my close and loving mother and that was only a few
messages.messageBody:
Amy,

We too don't use babysitters, in fact my children aged 7.5 and 3.5 have only
been left about 3 times by my close and loving mother and that was only a
few months ago!! Our 11mth old has obviously never been away from side :o)

I too don't even want to think about either of my 3 children saying they are
ready for their own bed, space becomes a factor with children e.s.p a big
ole 7 yr old, but we now have two beds joined together and i just love
having them with us!!

T.V, well I myself really enjoy some programmes and we are on and off it all
the time since being given one. I too, don't think they are nessercarily
"evil" but i do believe they aren't good!! We don't watch much and I intend
to keep it that way :o)

Carla
